name: IDEALS (Illinois Digital Environment for Access to Learning and Scholarship)
description: IDEALS is the Institutional Repository for the University of Illinois, collecting, disseminating, and providing persistent access to the research and scholarship of faculty, staff, and students at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and University of Illinois Springfield. Departments, labs, and research units can manage their own units and collections, and deposit materials such as working papers, technical reports, and other research outputs.
owner_name: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and University of Illinois Springfield
